product_description: The Anti-Theft Active Packable Backpack is great when you don’t know where your adventures will take you or what you will be bringing back. This lightweight backpack folds into its own pouch. It is the perfect “just in case” backpack for shopping, day trips, or once you reach your destination as an extra bag to carry home new treasures! Purposeful, practical design durably sewn and lightweight material. Breathable, no-shoulder-stress straps are designed to reduce shoulder burden and their sweat-free construction prevents annoying sweat stains. Never pay an airline fee again by keeping the packable backpack in your suitcase at all times – just in case. Now you can stop watching your bag and look up to see the world in front of you. Our built-in Anti-Theft security system will protect your valuables from pickpockets and thieves. Includes slash-resistant mesh barrier in front and bottom body panels; slash-resistant strap; locking compartments; and RFID blocking organizer. Travelon packs your bag with peace of mind.

name: Travelon Anti-Theft Classic Large Backpack
short_description: IDEAL FOR THE EVERYDAY COMMUTE, THE DIGITAL NOMAD, A RESORT WEEKEND, or EUROPEAN VACATION because your travel style is as essential as safety. At home or abroad, where travelers go thieves are not far behind. No worries, Travelon has packed this bag with 100% peace-of-mind.

SAFETY & SECURITY ARE IN THE BAG with a built in PATENTED ANTI-THEFT SECURITY SYSTEM protecting your valuables within. It includes: Locking compartments; Slash resistant body; RFID protected pockets and slots; and a Slash resistant strap. A stylish front zippered provides more organization space for quick grab items.

PERFORMANCE ORGANIZATION the locking voluminous 20 liter main compartment has a padded sleeve that fits up to a 15” laptop. Rear locking compartment sleeve is fleece lined and fits up to a 17” laptop with a width of 11” or less. In addtion, both sleeves can fit any size tablet or iPad. A generous locking front compartment contains RFID identity protected slots and drop pocket for cards and passports, a wide drop pocket for a mobile phone, eye glasses or small tablet, and a tethered key clip.

THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED this bag aligns the rules of fit, balance and proportion to work with your body not against it. Slash-resistant, adjustable straps allow you to find your personal fit. And air-mesh straps and back panel makes for a cool carry as air flows between you and your bag. With a rear trolley strap you can slide your backpack securely onto the handles of your wheeled luggage, allowing you to move easier and faster through any airport.
BACKPACK SIZE: 11.75"W x 18"H x 7"D, Weight (lbs): 2, Strap Length: 60", Volume (liters): 20
product_description: The Travelon Anti-Theft Classic Large Backpack has all the space, organization and protection you'll need in a day bag or carry-on. Stay organized with 3 compartments. The front compartment has RFID blocking card and passport slots, an open top and zip pocket, 2 pen loops and a tethered key clip. The rear compartment is fleece lined to hold a laptop to 15.6 inches and has a padded pocket for an iPad or tablet. The roomy main compartment has a wall pocket to hold large items. A top grab handle and trolley strap make it versatile and easy to carry. Front zippered pocket for quick grab items. Travel securely and confidently with Travelon's anti-theft technology, including slash-resistant construction, locking compartments, and slash-resistant straps to keep you and your belongings protected.
